description: Sum of squares of digits of ternary representation of n.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
Michael Gilleland, Some Self-Similar Integer Sequences
Robert Walker, Self Similar Sloth Canon Number Sequences
maple: A006287 := proc(n)    local t,d ;    t := convert(n,base,3) ;    add(d^2,d=t) ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 13 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
